name: K-3462
description:
This game is my submission to the April 2021 'VHS Horror Franchise' Game Jam.

Enemy is based on SCP - 3462, so looking up the story may help understand the entity and it's behaviours.

Story:

You have been asked to do a weekend night shift at Mockbuster (Video Store).

You step off the bus and approach the doors, something raises the hair on the back of your neck. You shrug it off as just the cool air and enter the building.

The Manager has left you a to-do list before you can leave, but something doesn't want you to leave.

Goals:

Finish the 3 tasks on the to-do list in-game and then you can leave.

Avoid or feed the entity.

Survive.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look

Left Shift - Slow Walk

Left Ctrl - Crouch

LMB - Grab/Interact

RMB - Throw held item

Middle Mouse Scroll - Rotate held item

1, 2, 3 - Change item rotation axis

P or Esc - Pause menu

Extras:

There is an extras menu that displays items from in the game, but they unlock as you interact with them in-game.

There are 2 endings, one by completing all tasks and the other by 'appeasing' the entity.

Hope you enjoy this as much as I did creating it!!
